vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A womanof the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.18; married to Caleb (H3612H)
§ Jerioth = "curtains"
the wife or concubine of Caleb, the son of Hezron of the descendants of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: esposa de Caleb; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶略 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "幔子"
猶大的子孫希斯崙的兒子迦勒的妻或妾 (代上2:18)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶略 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "幔子"
犹大的子孙希斯仑的儿子迦勒的妻或妾 (代上2:18)
